4300860.name: Food Truck Together
4300860.description:
Carry grandpa's legacy from Willowbrook to the world. Open world, up to 4 friends. Cook while the truck moves. One drives, one navigates, others at the grill. Bump? Tomatoes fly. Patty burns, driver helpless. One budget, fuel or stock. Someone will spend it without asking.

Grandpa started with nothing in Willowbrook. Now his truck is yours.

OPEN WORLD

Five towns. Goldcrest, Dusty Flats, Harborside, Kellerman Airfield, Willowbrook. Drive anywhere. Deliver anywhere. Your map, your route.

TAKE ORDERS

Customers send orders to your tablet. Location, toppings, how they want it cooked. Accept what pays, skip what doesn't. Your call.

COOK ON THE MOVE

Grill the patties. Add the toppings. Check the order. The truck doesn't stop. You shouldn't either.

DRIVE

Physics-based. Every bump shakes the cargo. Every hard brake slides your stock. Every sharp turn tests your shelves. Dusty Flats will teach you this the hard way.

NAVIGATE

Driver watches the road. Navigator watches the tablet. Miss a turn, add ten minutes. Communication or disaster.

BUY FUEL

Gas stations. The truck runs on fuel. No fuel, no delivery. Check the gauge.

BUY STOCK

Wholesalers. Patties, buns, tomatoes, lettuce, sauce. Truck space is limited. Pick what you need.

MANAGE THE BUDGET

One wallet. Fuel costs money. Stock costs money. You won't have enough for both. Decide together. Or don't — someone will spend it anyway.

DELIVER

On time, correct order — full pay. Late, wrong toppings, burnt patty — less. Simple.

PLAY TOGETHER

Up to 4 players. One drives, one navigates, others cook. Or swap. Anytime. No fixed roles.

Features:

* Five towns — different roads, different chaos

* Orders on the move — no parking, no waiting

* Grill, assemble, deliver — timing matters

* Physics-based driving — your cargo's worst enemy

* Gas stations and wholesalers — budget's always tight

* Up to 4 player co-op — swap roles anytime

* Grandpa's photo watches. No pressure.
4300860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
